mapper.select: select id,POST_CODE AS postCode,POST_NAME AS postName from mp_post
SELECT count(*) from mp_post where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_code = #{postCode}
SELECT count(*) from mp_post where (#{id} is null or id != #{id}) and post_name = #{postName}

with ages as ( select TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR ,BIRTHDAY, now()) AS years from mp_post p, mp_userpost up , mp_staff s where p.id = up.POST_ID and s.user_id = up.USER_ID and up.USER_ID = s.user_id and s.STAFF_SCOPE = '1' and p.id = #{postId} ) select sum( case when years < 20 then 1 else 0 end) as age1 , sum( case when years < 30 and years >= 20 then 1 else 0 end) as age2, sum( case when years < 40 and years >= 30 then 1 else 0 end) as age3, sum( case when years < 50 and years >= 40 then 1 else 0 end) as age4, sum( case when years < 65 and years >= 50 then 1 else 0 end) as age5, sum( case when years > 65 then 1 else 0 end) as age6 from ages

select p.POST_NAME postName, p.POST_CODE postCode, p.CREATOR_NAME creatorName, p.CREATED_TIME createdTime, s.SECTION_NAME sectionName, pp.PIPELINE_NAME pipelineName, j.JOB_LEVEL_NAME jobLevelName, jg.JOB_grade_NAME jobGradeName, COALESCE(g1.GROUP_NAME,g2.GROUP_NAME) groupName from mp_post p left join mp_section s on p.SECTION_CODE = s.SECTION_CODE left join mp_pipeline pp on p.PIPELINE_CODE = pp.PIPELINE_CODE left join mp_job_level j on p.JOB_LEVEL_CODE = j.JOB_LEVEL_CODE left join mp_job_grade jg on j.JOB_grade_CODE = jg.JOB_grade_CODE left join mp_group g1 on s.GROUP_ID = g1.id left join mp_group g2 on pp.GROUP_ID = g2.id ${limit}

select p.POST_NAME postName, p.POST_CODE postCode, s.STAFF_NAME staffName, s.STAFF_CODE staffCode, s.MOBILE mobile, up.ORG_DEPT_ID deptId from mp_post p inner join mp_userpost up on p.id= up.POST_ID inner join mp_staff s on s.user_id = up.USER_ID order by p.id ${limit}
